project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Install necessary libraries for API access and data handling
Implement the functionality to fetch current weather data from a public API
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the functionality to ensure accurate fetching, parsing, and displaying of weather data
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
